rm(list = ls())

setwd("~/GitHub/LTDE/")
library(xtable)
library(dplyr)

df <- read.table("data/pmc/pmc_death_BM_PL_summary.csv", 
                 header = TRUE, sep = ",", row.names = 1, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
drops <- c("test")
df.no812 <- read.table("data/pmc/pmc_death_BM_PL_no812_summary.csv", 
                 header = TRUE, sep = ",", row.names = 1, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df <- df[ , !(names(df) %in% drops)]
df.no812 <- df.no812[ , !(names(df.no812) %in% drops)]
df$lambda <- as.numeric(df$lambda)
df.no812$lambda <- as.numeric(df.no812$lambda)

df.bind <- bind_rows(df,df.no812)
df.bind$parameter <- c("$\\overline{\\mathrm{log}_{10} \\lambda}$", "$\\overline{k}$", "$\\overline{\\mathrm{log}_{10} \\lambda}$", "$\\overline{k}$")

#"$\\overline{\\mathrm{log}_{10} \\lambda}$"

bacillus.TF <- c("True", "True", "False", "False")
df.bind <- cbind(bacillus.TF , df.bind)



colnames(df.bind) <- c("Bacillus included", "Parameter", "Likelihood ratio", "p-value", "$\\sigma_{BM}$", "$\\sigma_{PL}$",  "$\\lambda_{PL}$")


mat <- xtable(df.bind, display = c("s","s", "s","g","f", "f", "f", "g"), align=c("c" ,"c","c","c","c", "c","c","c"))

print(mat, comment=FALSE, include.rownames=FALSE, math.style.exponents = TRUE, sanitize.text.function = function(x) {x})
